nodes.text: Arions were flying, winged Manta ray-like creatures that could be found in the deserts of Tatooine. The dangerous creatures had blue and gold skin, as well as red eyes.
Unnamed in the game or its manual, the Arion was named in a Nintendo Power magazine article detailing the Super Star Wars: Return of the Jedi video game. It also described it as a "flying manta ray."
